and so as it stands this process takes about three to four weeks every quarter span as many as

and so goal number one that we're really trying to accomplish may be obvious but it's an
automation problem we want to fix these manual handoffs we want to speed up the the feedback time
to do this process and we want to you know reduce for errors
and a secondary piece of this is that because it takes so long to run we can
only really do this once per quarter it's too much of an effort investment
and so we think by automating this we can really unlock the second piece of the problem which is business casing and
